title: Delivery Controller SDK
description: XenApp and XenDesktop provide an SDK based on a number of Microsoft Windows PowerShell version 3.0 snap-ins that allows you to perform the same tasks as you would with the Citrix Studio console, together with tasks you cannot do with Studio alone.

title: Citrix Receiver for HTML5 SDK
description: Use the Citrix Receiver for HTML5 SDK to enhance support for HDX sessions and to build a rich app experience in your Enterprise portals with the Receiver for HTML5.

title: AppDNA SDK
description: The AppDNA SDK enables you to provide AppDNA within a process or user interface that your users are familiar with, or within a simple web page. These topics introduce the AppDNA software development kit (SDK), describe what data is available, and how to develop using the AppDNA SDK.

title: XenServer SDK
description: Reference guide for Citrix XenServer SDK

title: Monitor Service OData API
description: Reference guide for the Monitor Service OData API

title: StoreFront SDK
description: The Citrix StoreFront Web API and SDK are programming interfaces to Citrix StoreFront services.

title: Provisioning Services SOAP Server Programmer's Guide
description: Use Provisioning Services' SOAP Server programming interface to manage your implementation from a command line or from scripts.

title: Citrix XenServer Management API
description: The Citrix XenServer Management API is an API for remotely configuring and controlling virtualised guests running on a XenServer pool.

title: Citrix Virtual Channel SDK for Android
description: The Citrix Virtual Channel Software Development Kit (SDK) provides support for writing server-side applications and client-side drivers for additional virtual channels using the ICA protocol.

title: Fast Connect 3 Credential Insertion API for Citrix Receiver for Windows
description: The Fast Connect 3 Credential Insertion API provides an interface that supplies user credentials to the single sign-on (SSO) feature of Citrix Receiver for Windows 4.2 and later.

title: Citrix Virtual Channel SDK for Windows
description: The Citrix Virtual Channel Software Development Kit (SDK) provides support for writing server-side applications and client-side drivers for additional virtual channels using the ICA protocol.

title: Citrix Virtual Channel SDK for Citrix Receiver for Linux
description: The Citrix Virtual Channel Software Development Kit (SDK) provides support for writing server-side applications and client-side drivers for additional virtual channels using the ICA protocol.

title: Command Reference for Citrix Receiver for Linux
description: Command-line reference and parameters for Citrix Recevier for Linux 13.5
